remarks: Relationship between Abelian group subtraction and addition. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)
statement:
ablsubadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablsubadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
ablsubadd.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
ablsubadd $p |- ( ( G e. Abel /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .- Y ) = Z <-> ( Y .+ Z ) = X ) ) $.
